member.name: T:FileFormat.Slides.Common.FileFormatException
member.summary: Custom exception class for file format-related exceptions.

member.name: M:FileFormat.Slides.Common.FileFormatException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception.
member.param: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
The exception that is the cause of the current exception, or a null reference if no inner exception is specified.
